title: New: Sam Smith – Safe With Me (Tourist Remix)
body:
With remixes of HAIM and CHVRCHES already under his belt, **Tourist** shows yet again that he has what it takes to remix the buzziest of buzz bands with his take on **Sam Smith’s** _Safe With Me_.

Initially rumbling along fairly nonchalantly, by the time it hits the two minute mark it’s  opened out into a dancefloor filler.
